description: This file declares a deprecated interface IController for a plugin system within the WPEFramework project, providing methods for device control and configuration management.

classes.name: IController
classes.description: A virtual interface defining control operations such as persisting state, deleting paths, rebooting, retrieving environments and configurations, and cloning callsigns.

methods.name: Delete
methods.description: Deletes a specified resource identified by a path.

methods.name: Environment
methods.description: Retrieves environment information for a given index.

methods.name: Configuration (getter)
methods.description: Retrieves the configuration for a specified callsign.

methods.name: Configuration (setter)
methods.description: Sets the configuration for a specified callsign.

methods.name: Clone
methods.description: Creates a new callsign based on a base callsign.

ctags.name: IController
ctags.pattern: /^struct DEPRECATED EXTERNAL IController : public virtual Core::IUnknown {$/
